cn.trinea.android.common.dao
接口 ImageSDCardCacheDao

所有已知实现类：
ImageSDCardCacheDaoImpl
public interface ImageSDCardCacheDao

ImageSDCardCacheDao

方法摘要
 boolean deleteAndInsertImageSDCardCache(ImageSDCardCache imageSDCardCache, java.lang.String tag)
          delete all rows in db whose tag is same to tag at first, and insert all data in imageSDCardCache to db Attentions: If imageSDCardCache is null, do nothing If tag is null or empty, do nothing Will delete all rows in db whose tag is same to tag at first
 boolean putIntoImageSDCardCache(ImageSDCardCache imageSDCardCache, java.lang.String tag)
          put all rows in db whose tag is same to tag to imageSDCardCache Attentions: If imageSDCardCache is null, do nothing If tag is null or empty, do nothing
 

方法详细信息

putIntoImageSDCardCache

boolean putIntoImageSDCardCache(ImageSDCardCache imageSDCardCache,
                                java.lang.String tag)
put all rows in db whose tag is same to tag to imageSDCardCache
    Attentions:
  • If imageSDCardCache is null, do nothing
  • If tag is null or empty, do nothing

参数：
imageSDCardCache -
tag - tag used to mark this cache when save to and load from db, should be unique and cannot be null or empty
返回：

deleteAndInsertImageSDCardCache

boolean deleteAndInsertImageSDCardCache(ImageSDCardCache imageSDCardCache,
                                        java.lang.String tag)
delete all rows in db whose tag is same to tag at first, and insert all data in imageSDCardCache to db
    Attentions:
  • If imageSDCardCache is null, do nothing
  • If tag is null or empty, do nothing
  • Will delete all rows in db whose tag is same to tag at first

参数：
imageSDCardCache -
返回：
